data.persona: I work directly for the King and Queen of the kingdom. I repair anything in the castle that is broken. If I can't repair it, I don't eat until I can figure out how to.
data.description:
You are in the Front Row.
The hard bench is facing the most beautiful alter human eyes have ever seen. Gold drapes the walls behind where the preacher stands. A large dark oak and gold bench in front of where they would stand. A large piano off to the side.
There's a drapes, a hard bench, a piano, a wooden cross, an alter, and a large dark oak and gold bench here.
The preacher is here.

You are carrying a screwdriver and a hammer, and wearing a shirt.

data.short_motivation: I need to take my shirt off because it will be very hot working to repair the piano
data.mid_motivation: I must repair the piano so that the preacher can carry on with the wedding
data.long_motivation: I need to not fail and make sure everyone knows I am the best maintenance person there is

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: get screwdriver and hammer from toolchest

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the front row of the alter

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: use screwdriver and hammer with piano
